sentences.cn: 巨大的全球计算机网络

sentences.en: An automatic weather station feeds information on wind direction to the computer.
sentences.cn: 自动化气象站将风向信息输入计算机。

sentences.en: An intelligent computer will be an indispensable diagnostic tool for doctors.
sentences.cn: 智能计算机将成为医生不可或缺的诊断工具。

sentences.en: Finding a volunteer to write the computer program isn't a problem.
sentences.cn: 找个志愿者编这个计算机程序不成问题。

sentences.en: Hackers are said to have started a computer virus.
sentences.cn: 据说黑客们已经开始传播一种新的电脑病毒。

sentences.en: He proceeded to give Dan directions to the computer room.
sentences.cn: 他接着告诉丹去计算机房该怎么走。

sentences.en: He programmed his computer to compare all the possible combinations.
sentences.cn: 他给他的计算机编制了一套程序，以比较所有可能的组合。

sentences.en: I set up the computer so that they could work from home.
sentences.cn: 我把电脑设置好，这样他们就可以在家办公了。

sentences.en: Millions of people want new, simplified ways of interacting with a computer.
sentences.cn: 数以百万计的人们想要新的简化方式实现人机交互。

sentences.en: No-one could use the computer unless they had a password.
sentences.cn: 除非知道密码，否则谁也用不了那台计算机。

sentences.en: The computer is a leveller, making information available to everyone.
sentences.cn: 计算机是公平之物，所有人物都能从中获得信息。

sentences.en: The repairman reported back that the computer had a virus.
sentences.cn: 修理工报告说电脑染了病毒。

sentences.en: Thousands and thousands of start-up firms have poured into the computer market.
sentences.cn: 成千上万家新成立的公司已涌进了计算机市场。

sentences.en: We look for applicants who are numerate, computer-literate and energetic self-starters.
sentences.cn: 我们对求职者的要求是具备运算能力，熟练使用电脑，精力充沛而且工作积极主动。

sentences.en: Who wants to buy a computer from a failing company?
sentences.cn: 谁愿意从一家要倒闭的公司买计算机呢？

sentences.en: You can store your entire CD collection on the computer's hard drive.
sentences.cn: 你可以将收藏的全部CD保存在电脑硬盘上。

words.tran_cn: 电脑的；电脑化的；用电脑处理的
电脑化；电子计算机化工作
计算；处理；从事电脑工作
使电脑化（computerise的过去分词形式）；用电脑处理
用电子计算机控制（computerize的过去分词）
计算；估算；用计算机计算
（英）用计算机处理；给…装备计算机（等于computerize）
使电脑化；使计算机化；用电脑处理

phrases.tran_cn: 计算机硬件，电脑硬件；硬件
计算机编程；计算机程序设计

trans.tran_en: an electronic machine that stores information and uses programs to help you find, organize, or change the information
an electronic machine that stores information and uses programs to help you find, organize, or change the information
